tags: how they literally didn't care and put that joke in this movie
we doesn't give a shit about such jokes
summary: I love the scene where Loki tries to take control over Tony in Avengers, but it doesn't work, in German dub, because it's...
body:
I love the scene where Loki tries to take control over Tony in Avengers, but it doesn’t work, in German dub, because it’s just:

(translated version)

Loki: This usually works.

Tony: Well, that is a thing with men… It’s not uncommon. One out of five has–


(German dub)

Loki: Das gelingt für gewöhnlich.

Tony: Na, das ist bei Männern so ne Sache… Ist nicht ungewöhnlich. Einer von fünf hat–

summary: MerMay Day 24: Fandom. Yes, another fandom one. This time I went with Marvel. Figured it was only appropriate to give Black...

summary: Just saw the Fuck/Marry/Kill video with Tom Holland, and now I just kinda want Spiderman having this crush on Starlord, and...
body: Just saw the Fuck/Marry/Kill video with Tom Holland, and now I just kinda want Spiderman having this crush on Starlord, and Peter Q being all “Aw, nice kid, but too young” and Tony being all “How do I explain to my son about bad-but-fun life choices without coming off as a MASSIVE hypocrite???”

reblog.comment: Just saw the Fuck/Marry/Kill video with Tom Holland, and now I just kinda want Spiderman having this crush on Starlord, and Peter Q being all “Aw, nice kid, but too young” and Tony being all “How do I explain to my son about bad-but-fun life choices without coming off as a MASSIVE hypocrite???”

title: Just a reminder
body:
In the next Avengers movie that if they do actually plan to go back in time.

Which will most likely be when the New York shit went down with Loki.

Not only would we get Loki back, but we’d also get to have Wanda and Pietro back, along with Vision and Bucky.

But also they could convince Ultron to join them in defeating Thanos. and Then they could kill Ultron with Vision, and they would probably destroy all the stones or get them lost along the galaxy.

They also could keep Odin, and the two other all powerful god like characters alive and have them help defeat Thanos.

title: The D in Apartment 23
body:
Bucky is trying to live a normal life between missions, trying to stay unnoticed in civilian life like the ghost people believe him to be.

3 Days From Now

The room was silent with the exception of the muttering coming from the work station in the corner next to Tony’s. Harry had come down to try and get a head start on the project that Stark and…

Read more…

summary:
O DERRADEIRO ATAQUE DA HIDRA
 Chega hoje aos pontos de venda de periódicos o sétimo volume da segunda série de Os Vingadores...
body:
O DERRADEIRO ATAQUE DA HIDRA

Chega hoje aos pontos de venda de periódicos o sétimo volume da segunda série de Os Vingadores editado pela Goody. Este volume reúne os comic books CAPTAIN AMERICA: STEVE ROGERS #7 e SECRET EMPIRE #1-3.

Clique nas imagens para as visualizar em toda a sua extensão:

Eis a sinopse da editora:

Depois de meses de manipulação e esquemas, Steve Rogers, o Capitão América original transformado por um Cubo Cósmico num agente adormecido da Hidra, conseguiu finalmente que os Estados Unidos ficassem sob o controlo desta organização criminosa. Para piorar a situação, a Terra prepara-se para ser atacada por uma gigantesca horda Chitauri, tendo sido criado um impenetrável Escudo de Defesa Planetária para evitar a invasão. A criação do mesmo deixou muitos dos seres mais poderosos da Terra fora do Planeta, encontrando se apenas um punhado de heróis em posição de contrariar o sinistro regime do Capitão América… ou arcar com as consequências. O Império Secreto, uma das mais fortes sagas da Marvel dos últimos tempos, em todo o seu esplendor.

Os Vingadores Série II Vol.7
Formato: 168 x 260 mm
Encadernação: capa mole, lombada
Nº de páginas: 128
PVP: €7,90
Periodicidade: mensal.

[sc name=”banner_flex”]

blog.description: This is really just another blog made by just another fan who has so much fan inside of herself that she has to get it out somewhere.

summary: That site didthanoskill.me is so stupid. No matter how many times I try, no matter what device I'm on it always says I was slain...
body: That site didthanoskill.me is so stupid. No matter how many times I try, no matter what device I’m on it always says I was slain by Thanos for the good of the universe. And that’s not even the worst part! My brother is somehow spared every single time!

reblog.comment: That site didthanoskill.me is so stupid. No matter how many times I try, no matter what device I’m on it always says I was slain by Thanos for the good of the universe. And that’s not even the worst part! My brother is somehow spared every single time!

summary: Wait a sec! Rocket doesn't know he is the only one left among the guardians. He only knows Groot has dissapeared. For all we...
body: Wait a sec! Rocket doesn’t know he is the only one left among the guardians. He only knows Groot has dissapeared. For all we know he is sitting in Wakanda just waiting for Quill, Drax, Mantis and Gamora. He is smart, he knows they may not all have survived but what are the chances they are all gone?

reblog.comment: Wait a sec! Rocket doesn’t know he is the only one left among the guardians. He only knows Groot has dissapeared. blog.name: themcwrathofsean
blog.title: Still Don’t Have Anything Clever For This
blog.description: Came for my nerdy fandoms, stayed because I love my mutuals more than I hate this hellsite. Home of The Adventures of 6 inch Supergirl (on indefinite hiatus until the show stops torturing Lena Luthor.) I try to reblog what makes me happy more than what doesn’t but results will vary. INFJ if you're into that sort of thing.

summary:
Gamora: You’ve got ten kids and five chairs. What do you do? 
All the Guardians and Avengers: Bring five more chairs. 
Thanos:...
body:
Gamora: You’ve got ten kids and five chairs. What do you do?

All the Guardians and Avengers: Bring five more chairs.

Thanos: Kill half the children.

Gamora, the Guardians, the Avengers:
